name: Flower Protector
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 gamejam, Theme: Keep it alive.

You have a flower that needs water, light, and a mighty protector. You will have to keep its demands high enough for it to survive until time runs out. 

Flower needs sunlight and water, and will also be attacked by evil ants who want to eat it. You have powers to control weather and daytime by dragging around rain clouds and the sky sphere itself. You can also turn rain on/off.

Controls:

Mouse click and drag - to control daytime and rain clouds

Mouse click - to kill enemies

Mouse scroll up/down to turn rain on/off

Music by spinningmerkaba.
